original_text: Those people really knew about God. But they did not respect him as a great God, and they did not thank him. They did not even think clearly any more. Their minds became confused and they did not understand God's message.
korean_text: 하나님을 알되 하나님을 영화롭게도 아니하며 감사하지도 아니하고 오히려 그 생각이 허망하여지며 미련한 마음이 어두워졌나니

sentences.original_text: Those people really knew about God
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람들은 정말로 하나님에 대해 알았다

sentences.original_text: But they did not respect him as a great God
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 그를 위대한 하나님으로 존경하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: and they did not thank him
They did not even think clearly any more
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 이상 명확하게 생각하지 못했다

sentences.original_text: and they did not understand God's message
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 하나님의 메시지를 이해하지 못했다
